info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 30 at 10:37PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern La Porte and central Berrien Counties through 1130 PM EDT/1030 PM CDT/... At 1037 PM EDT/937 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 13 miles northwest of Shorewood-Tower Hill to Long Beach to Westville. Movement was northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Michigan City, Benton Harbor, St. Joseph, Trail Creek, Fair Plain, Benton Heights, Bridgman, New Buffalo, Three Oaks, Long Beach, Stevensville, Pottawattamie Park, Shorewood-Tower Hill, Shorewood-Tower Hills-Harbert, Lake Michigan Beach, Sodus, Riverside, Baroda, Shoreham and Galien. This includes the following highways... Interstate 196 between mile markers 0 and 7. Interstate 80 in Indiana between mile markers 38 and 43, and between mile markers 45 and 50. Interstate 94 in Indiana between mile markers 33 and 45. Interstate 94 in Michigan between mile markers 0 and 36. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
